description: Try our easy to follow Mexican Baked Potato recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jacket potato,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Mexican Baked Potato Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp chilli powder (for mild flavour use 1/2 teaspoon)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and place the potatoes on the baking tray, bake (approximately 180Â°C) for 50 minutes or until potatoes are soft and cooked.
Add olive oil to pan and fry the onion, corn and capsicum for 10 minutes on medium heat until onion is soft.
Add chipotle chilli powder and diced chilli and cook for a further 2 minutes.
Remove from heat and then add the chopped cherry tomatoes, coriander and black beans to the onion min.
Cut a cross in the top of each potato and gently squeeze the base to open, top with a spoonful of vegetable mix and dollop of sour cream. Serve.
